com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency
Class AsyncRequest

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
      com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency.AsyncRequest

public class AsyncRequest
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>

Requests and loads a resource using the HTTP GET method in the background. Will call the AsyncRequest.AsyncRequestResultListener registered in the constructor in the same thread which triggered the request / loading process. Uses the Android AsyncTask mechanism.

didRequestThrowError

public boolean didRequestThrowError()
Returns the local error thrown when trying to send the request. An exception typically means that there was a problem connecting to the network, but checking the type of the returned error can give a more accurate cause for the error.

getRequestThrownError

public java.lang.Throwable getRequestThrownError()
Returns the local error thrown when trying to send the request. An exception typically means that there was a problem connecting to the network, but checking the type of the returned error can give a more accurate cause for the error.

Returns whether a successful HTTP status code was returned.
